short_desc: Offers spaying, neutering, vaccination and other various services for dogs, cats and bunnies
description: Offers spaying, neutering, vaccination and other various services for dogs and cats. In addition, provides free spay and neuter surgeries for pit bulls and pit bull mixes owned by residents of Alameda and Contra Costa counties. Open Tuesday-Friday . Not a walk-in facility; the doors are locked at 8am and do not open again until the 3pm pick-up time. Calls are returned within 24-48 hours.Offers reduced pricing to residents of Alameda and Contra Costa counties who can demonstrate financial need or hardship, individuals on any kind of government assistance, and low-wage earners.
